page.title: 16My morning
page.content: Saturday 1st June Wake up 7.28am get dressed, go down- stairs to make breakfast.After break- fast I ring up Sarah to see if she would like to come to play and the decision is made to go swimming in five minutes time.I brush my hair and clean my teeth. "Ring ring".There goes the door bell. "They're here mummy! Bye." I go down the drive and find Sarah's car waiting for me.We get to Marlborough swimming pool and we have a race to see who would get ready first,I win. We stay in the pool for about an hour. We get dressed and go out into the lobby to get our sweets. We take the bus home to Ogbourne St George.
